content: r4 chain 3 double_crochet around 14 sts r5 chain 3 double_crochet increase 2 double_crochet repeat you will end with 1 double_crochet 19 sts r6 chain 3 double_crochet around 19 sts r7 chain 3 double_crochet increase 2 double_crochet repeat 26 sts r8-9 chain 3 double_crochet around 26 sts r10 chain 3 double_crochet increase 3 double_crochet repeat you will end with 1 double_crochet 33 sts r11-12 chain 3 double_crochet around 33 sts r13 chain 3 double_crochet increase 4 double_crochet repeat you will end with 2 double_crochet 40 sts r14 chain 3 double_crochet around 40 sts r15 chain 3 double_crochet increase double_crochet 19 repeat 42 sts follow directions for the band below band of the hat switch to the cream fur yarn it can be challenging to work with fur yarn you will need to feel the stitches as you go since you cannot see the definition of each stitch to make things easier for these rounds join to the chain 2 space instead of into the chain and crochet into the space between each stitch instead of the stitch itself counting your stitches as you go will also make it easier to keep track of stitch count r16-19 r13-16 for x-small chain 2 half_double_crochet around x-small 30 sts small 34 sts medium 38 sts large 42 sts cut the yarn and weave in all ends use the same fur yarn to make a pom pom for the end of your hat the pattern and images contained in this document are the property of you ve been yarned pattern is for personal use only do not redistribute and sell the pattern you may sell finished products please give pattern credit to you ve been yarned come say hi on instagram and tag me in a pic of your finished hat https //www instagram com/youvebeenyarned/ thank you
